summary.span: 指定与消息及其交换相关联的 SOAP 和 WS-Addressing 的版本。

span.span: Specifies the versions of SOAP and WS-Addressing associated with a message and its exchange.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含消息所用的 SOAP 信封和寻址协议的版本信息。The contains the versioning information both about the SOAP envelope and the addressing protocol that is used by a message. 通过将版本作为参数传递到 重载之一， 的实例在创建时绑定到特定 。An instance of is bound upon creation to a specific by passing the version as a parameter into one of the overloads. 此类中的所有静态“get”属性（如 和 ）都具有类似于枚举的语义。All the static "get" properties in this class, such as and have enumeration-like semantics. 它们提供 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 运行时支持的可能消息版本的枚举。They provide an enumeration of the possible message versions supported by the Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) runtime. 消息具有某种信封结构和某种寻址结构。A message has an envelope structure and an addressing structure. 只是同时提供 {, } 的一种快捷方式。 is just a shortcut for supplying {, } together. 目前，有两个 SOAP 信封版本可用：SOAP 1.1 和 SOAP 1.2。There are currently two SOAP envelope versions available: SOAP 1.1 and SOAP 1.2. SOAP 的这些版本由 表示，并由 和 属性返回。These versions of SOAP are represented by and are returned by the and properties. 与 关联的 SOAP 版本可以通过使用 属性进行恢复。The version of SOAP associated with the can be recovered by using the property. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [soap 1.1](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96641) 和 [soap 1.2](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96642)的架构。For more information, see the schema for [SOAP 1.1](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96641) and [SOAP 1.2](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96642). 目前，有两个 WS-Addressing 版本可用。There are currently two versions of WS-Addressing available. 一个是 2004 年 8 月 10 日提交的版本，另一个是在 WS-Addressing 1.0 协议中指定的版本。The one submitted on 10 August 2004 and the one specified in the WS-Addressing 1.0 protocol. 当前消息版本所用的地址版本可通过 属性进行恢复。The address version used by the current message version can be recovered using the property. WS-Addressing 的这些版本由 表示，并由 和 属性返回。These versions of WS-Addressing are represented by and are returned by the and properties. WS-Addressing August 2004 已作为旧值保留。The WS-Addressing August 2004 is retained as a legacy value. 2004年8月的 W3C 成员提交用于 WS-ADDRESSING [ (ws-addressing) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96643)。The 10 August 2004 W3C Member Submission for WS-Addressing is available at [Web Services Addressing (WS-Addressing)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96643). 2005年8月的 W3C 候选建议，适用于 WS-ADDRESSING 1.0-核心，可在 [Web 服务寻址 1.0-核心](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96644)。The 17 August 2005 W3C Candidate Recommendation for WS-Addressing 1.0 - Core is available at [Web Services Addressing 1.0 - Core](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96644). 支持使用 "纯旧 XML" (POX) 样式消息。 provides support for using "plain old XML" (POX)-style messaging. 这样，启用基本 POX 消息传递就只是在服务上与使用 的文本编码器建立 HTTP 绑定。Enabling basic POX messaging is now a matter of setting up an HTTP binding on your service with a text encoder that uses . 消息版本对象可以使用 重载之一以及指定版本的 WS-Addressing 和 SOAP 进行创建。Message version objects can be created using specified versions of WS-Addressing and SOAP using one of the overloads.

span.span: The that is associated with the current message version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks WS-Addressing 的这些版本由 表示，并由 和 属性返回。These versions of WS-Addressing are represented by and are returned by the and properties. WS-Addressing August 2004 已作为旧值保留。The WS-Addressing August 2004 is retained as a legacy value. 2004年8月的 W3C 成员提交用于 WS-ADDRESSING [ (ws-addressing) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96643)。The 10 August 2004 W3C Member Submission for WS-Addressing is available at [Web Services Addressing (WS-Addressing)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96643). 2005年8月的 W3C 候选建议，适用于 WS-ADDRESSING 1.0-核心，可在 [Web 服务寻址 1.0-核心](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96644)。The 17 August 2005 W3C Candidate Recommendation for WS-Addressing 1.0 - Core is available at [Web Services Addressing 1.0 - Core](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96644). ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_MessageVersion#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_messageversion/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[S_UE_MessageVersion#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_messageversion/vb/module1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前可用的 SOAP 版本为 SOAP 1.1 和 SOAP 1.2。The SOAP versions currently available are SOAP 1.1 and SOAP 1.2. 每个 SOAP 版本都有一个 ，其中包含与它的使用相关的数据。There is an for each version of SOAP that contains the data relevant to its use. 目前，有两个 WS-Addressing 版本可用。There are currently two versions of WS-Addressing available. 一个版本于 2004 年 8 月 10 日提交，另一个版本于 2005 年 8 月提交，称为 WS-Addressing 1.0 协议。One submitted 10 August 2004 and the other submitted August 2005 and referred to as the WS-Addressing 1.0 protocol. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_MessageVersion#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_messageversion/cs/program.cs#12)] [!code-vb[S_UE_MessageVersion#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_messageversion/vb/module1.vb#12)]

SOAP 的这些版本由 表示，并由 和 属性返回。These versions of SOAP are represented by and are returned by the and properties. 与 关联的 SOAP 版本可以通过使用 属性进行恢复。The version of SOAP associated with the can be recovered by using the property. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [soap 1.1](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96641) 和 [soap 1.2](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96642)的架构。For more information, see the schema for [SOAP 1.1](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96641) and [SOAP 1.2](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96642). ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_MessageVersion#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_messageversion/cs/program.cs#2)] [!code-vb[S_UE_MessageVersion#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_messageversion/vb/module1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包括 和 。The consists of the and . 它为使用“纯旧式 XML”(POX) 样式消息传递提供支持。This provides support for using "plain old XML" (POX)-style messaging. 这样，启用基本 POX 消息传递就只是在服务上与使用 的文本编码器建立 HTTP 绑定。Enabling basic POX messaging is now a matter of setting up an HTTP binding on your service with a text encoder that uses . 请注意，当使用 来配置服务，并且 设置为 时，请求消息中的操作标头将会从响应消息中移除。Note that when a service is configured with the and the is set to , the action header in a request message is removed from the response message. 这与 ASMX 服务的工作方式一致。This is consistent with the way ASMX services work. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_MessageVersion#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_messageversion/cs/program.cs#4)] [!code-vb[S_UE_MessageVersion#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_messageversion/vb/module1.vb#4)]
